components.name: Button
components.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants, sizes, and states. Supports loading states, icons, and full-width layouts.

components.name: TextInput
components.description: A text input component with label, error handling, icons, and validation states.

components.name: TextBoxInput
components.description: A multi-line text input component (textarea) with label, error handling, and validation states.

components.name: EmailInput
components.description: An email input component with built-in validation.

components.name: PasswordInput
components.description: A password input component with visibility toggle and optional strength indicator.

components.name: DateInput
components.description: A date input component with a calendar picker interface. Supports single date selection or date ranges.

components.name: CheckboxInput
components.description: A checkbox input component with label, error handling, and validation states.

components.name: DropdownInput
components.description: A single-select dropdown input component built on react-select with theme integration.

components.name: PaginatedDropdownInput
components.description: A paginated dropdown input component with async loading support. Built on react-select with async pagination capabilities.

components.name: JsonInput
components.description: A JSON input component with syntax validation and formatting.

components.name: ColorSelector
components.description: A color picker component with a popover interface. Provides both simple and advanced color selection modes.

components.name: IconButton
components.description: A button component designed for displaying icons. Shows a border highlight when active.

components.name: ToggleIcon
components.description: A toggleable icon button component. Wraps IconButton with toggle state management.

components.name: DropdownMenu
components.description: A dropdown menu component with support for nested submenus, icons, and variants. Uses a props-based API.

components.name: Spinner
components.description: A loading spinner component using a rotating icon. Inherits text color from parent.

components.name: ThreeDotLoader
components.description: A loading indicator with three animated dots. Used internally by Button component when isLoading is true.

theme.name: ThemeProvider
theme.description: Theme provider component that supplies theme context to all child components. REQUIRED for library usage.

createTheme.description: Creates a theme object with the specified options (MUI-style API).

useTheme.description: Hook to access the current theme object.

useThemeMode.description: Hook to access and control the theme mode (light/dark).
